title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Net profits/loss in million euros, with a total of 5 data points.
Overall Net profits/loss in million euros has increased over the Year.
Net profits/loss in million euros is roughly constant from 2014 to 2016, gradually increasing from 2016 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Max Net profits/loss in million euros about 27.55 was recorded at Year 2017
Min Net profits/loss in million euros about 3.73 was recorded at Year 2016
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Net profits/loss in million euros, with a total of 5 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2014 to 2016.
But, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2017 to 2018.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2016 to 2017.
